InputSentence1: Rick grew up in a troubled household.
InputSentence2: He never found good support in family, and turned to gangs.
InputSentence3: It wasn't long before Rick got shot in a robbery.
InputSentence4: The incident caused him to turn a new leaf.

InputSentence1: Laverne needs to prepare something for her friend's party.
InputSentence2: She decides to bake a batch of brownies.
InputSentence3: She chooses a recipe and follows it closely.
InputSentence4: Laverne tests one of the brownies to make sure it is delicious.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: The brownies are so delicious Laverne eats two of them.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: Laverne doesn't go to her friend's party.

InputSentence1: Sarah had been dreaming of visiting Europe for years.
InputSentence2: She had finally saved enough for the trip.
InputSentence3: She landed in Spain and traveled east across the continent.
InputSentence4: She didn't like how different everything was.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: Sarah then decided to move to Europe.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: Sarah decided that she preferred her home over Europe.

InputSentence1: Gina was worried the cookie dough in the tube would be gross.
InputSentence2: She was very happy to find she was wrong.
InputSentence3: The cookies from the tube were as good as from scratch.
InputSentence4: Gina intended to only eat 2 cookies and save the rest.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: Gina liked the cookies so much she ate them all in one sitting.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: Gina gave the cookies away at her church.

InputSentence1: It was  my final performance in marching band.
InputSentence2: I was playing the snare drum in the band.
InputSentence3: We played Thriller and Radar Love.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: I was very proud of my performance.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: I was very ashamed of my performance.

InputSentence1: I had been giving this homeless man change everyday.
InputSentence2: He was on the same corner near my house.
InputSentence3: One day, as I was driving through my neighborhood I saw a new car.
InputSentence4: Soon enough, I saw the same homeless man emerge from it!
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: The next day I gave the man twenty dollars.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: I never gave the man money again.

InputSentence1: Jim found an old disposable camera in the bottom of his junk drawer.
InputSentence2: He began snapping away at everything around him.
InputSentence3: The counter clicked down to one final photo.
InputSentence4: The gravity of the situation began to dawn on Jim.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: Jim took time to decide what he would take a picture of.

InputSentence1: Ron started his new job as a landscaper today.
InputSentence2: He loves the outdoors and has always enjoyed working in it.
InputSentence3: His boss tells him to re-sod the front yard of the mayor's home.
InputSentence4: Ron is ecstatic, but does a thorough job and finishes super early.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: Ron is immediately fired for insubordination.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz2: His boss commends him for a job well done.

InputSentence1: John and Billy became very skilled at beer pong.
InputSentence2: They entered a contest in college.
InputSentence3: They won the contest and advanced to the next level.
InputSentence4: The next level sent them to Vegas.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: In Vegas, John and Billy competed against eighty contestants.

InputSentence1: Caroline was a student in medical school.
InputSentence2: Caroline worked very hard to get good grades.
InputSentence3: One day Caroline failed a test by one point.
InputSentence4: Caroline was very frustrated but she continued to study hard.
